episode: My father was recently taken to the emergency room and he is ok now so I have been spending a lot of time with him showing him love and care.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My father was recently taken the emergency room due to feeling quite sick.  He is ok and home now but I have been trying to spend a lot of time with him.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm glad he's okay. It's great you're spending time with him.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes I worry about his health as he is getting older and I want to show him a great deal of love and affection.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's very loving of you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes I know the day will come when he is no longer with us and I want to show him he is loved while he is still with me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so important.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really is.  Life is short and I know a lot of people have regrets and I do not want to have any.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, making memories now is key.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: You are correct.  He cannot get around very well anymore but I feel that simply spending time with him is enough.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, your presence matters most.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was very worried when I got the call telling me he was in the emergency room.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds so scary.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was!  My mind immediately went to worst case scenario.  It was somewhat of a false alarm but still a scary situation.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Understandable. Glad he's okay.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you I am too.  I hope it is a long time before I get a similar phone call.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I hope so too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you.  I am lucky that he is still with me and a part of my life.  I know a lot of people whose parents passed away when they were much younger than me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're fortunate indeed.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I really am.  Thank you for the support!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Anytime!
